## sdf_dim

## Description
`sdf_dim()`, `sdf_nrow()` and `sdf_ncol()` provide similar functionality to `dim()`, `nrow()` and `ncol()`.


## Usage
```r
sdf_dim(x)

sdf_nrow(x)

sdf_ncol(x)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | An object (usually a `spark_tbl`). |
